text: Adão Nunes Dornelles (2 April 1923 – 30 August 1991) was a Brazilian football player. He played for the Brazil national team. ==Clubs== * Diário Official F. C.: 1932 – 1942 * Internacional: 1943 – 1951 * Flamengo: 1951 – 1953 * XV de Jaú: 1951 – 1953 ==Honours== ; Internacional * Campeonato Gaúcho: 1944, 1945, 1947, 1948, 1950 ; Flamengo * Campeonato Carioca: 1953 ; Brazil * FIFA World Cup: Runner-up 1950 Category:1923 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Footballers from Porto Alegre
title: Adãozinho
